The Jungle.requires: (|Donkey Kong| AND |Diddy Kong|) OR ({YamlCompare(world_structure < 1)} AND |The Jungle|)

The Lake Shore.requires: (|Link| AND |Yoshi|) OR (|Mario| AND |Pit|) OR ({YamlCompare(world_structure < 1)} AND |The Lake Shore|)

The Path to the Ruins.requires: {Check_Ruins_Requirements()} OR ({YamlCompare(world_structure < 1)} AND |The Path to the Ruins|)

The Cave.requires: (|Pit| AND |Mario| AND |Kirby| AND |Link| AND |Yoshi|) OR ({YamlCompare(world_structure < 1)} AND |The Cave|)

The Wilds I.requires: (|Marth| AND |Meta Knight| AND |Ike|) OR ({YamlCompare(world_structure < 1)} AND |The Wilds I|)

The Wilds II.requires: (|Pit| AND |Mario| AND |Kirby| AND |Link| AND |Yoshi|) OR ({YamlCompare(world_structure < 1)} AND |The Wilds II|)

Outside the Ancient Ruins.requires: (|Captain Falcon| AND |Olimar|) OR ({YamlCompare(world_structure < 1)} AND |Outside the Ancient Ruins|)

The Glacial Peak.requires: (|Meta Knight| AND |Ice Climbers|) OR ({YamlCompare(world_structure < 1)} AND |The Glacial Peak|)

The Canyon.requires: (|Pit| AND |Mario| AND |Kirby| AND |Link| AND |Yoshi|) OR ({YamlCompare(world_structure < 1)} AND |The Canyon|)

The Subspace Bomb Factory I.requires: {Check_Bomb_Factory_Requirements()} OR ({YamlCompare(world_structure < 1)} AND |The Subspace Bomb Factory I|)

The Subspace Bomb Factory II.requires: (|Donkey Kong| AND |Diddy Kong| AND |Captain Falcon| AND |Olimar|) OR ({YamlCompare(world_structure < 1)} AND |The Subspace Bomb Factory II|)

Entrance to Subspace.requires: (|Captain Falcon| AND |Donkey Kong| AND |Diddy Kong| AND |Fox| AND |Falco| AND |Ice Climbers| AND |Marth| AND |Ike| AND |Kirby| AND |Link| AND |Lucario| AND |Lucas| AND |Mario| AND |Meta Knight| AND |Mr. Game & Watch| AND |Olimar| AND |Peach| AND |@Zelda/Sheik| AND |Pikachu| AND |Pit| AND |@Red| AND |R.O.B.| AND |@Samus Aran| AND |Snake| AND |Yoshi|) OR ({YamlCompare(world_structure < 1)} AND |Entrance to Subspace|)

Subspace I.requires: (|King Dedede| AND |Luigi| AND |Ness|) OR ({YamlCompare(world_structure < 1)} AND |Subspace I|)
